titles.title: Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic Act
Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic Act
To name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Las Cruces, New Mexico, the "Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic Act
This bill designates the community-based outpatient clinic of the Department of Veterans Affairs in Las Cruces, New Mexico, as the Las Cruces Bataan Memorial Clinic.
